verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I Am So Glad That Our Father In Heaven Tells Of His Love In The Book He Has Given; Wonderful Things In The Bible I See, This Is The Dearest, That Jesus Loves Me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I Am So Glad That Jesus Loves Me, Jesus Loves Me, Jesus Loves Me. I Am So Glad That Jesus Loves Me, Jesus Loves Even Me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Though I Forget Him, And Wander Away, Still He Doth Love Me Wherever I Stray; Back To His Dear Loving Arms I Do Flee, When I Remember That Jesus Loves Me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh, If There’s Only One Song I Can Sing, When In His Beauty I See The Great King, This Shall My Song Through Eternity Be, “Oh, What A Wonder That Jesus Loves Me!”

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: If One Should Ask Of Me, How Can I Tell? Glory To Jesus, I Know Very Well! God’s Holy Spirit With Mine Doth Agree, Constantly Witnessing Jesus Loves Me.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: In This Assurance I Find Sweetest Rest, Trusting In Jesus, I Know I Am Blessed; Satan, Dismayed, From My Soul Now Doth Flee, When I Just Tell Him That Jesus Loves Me.
